text: podayuchi lyudy, podayuchi zhinky, viryachi lyudyam, viryachym zhinkam, slukhnyani lyudy, slukhnyani zhinky, pravdyvi lyudy, pravdyvi zhinky, steadfast lyudy, steadfast zhinky, shanoblyvi lyudy, shanoblyvi zhinky, blahodiyni lyudy, blahodiyni zhinky, fasting lyudy, fasting zhinky, nevynni lyudy, nevynni zhinky, ta lyudy shcho svyatkuyut π BOHA chasto, ta svyatkuyuchi zhinky; BOH maye hotovyy do forgiveness yikh ta velykoyi vynahorody
